changelog:
Syberia OS updated!

Current build date: 12/23/2018
Minimum TWRP required: 3.2.3-0

Changelog:
new:
- Full Substratum support (service)
!!!Be very careful as many themes are not fully compatible with Android Pie.
You can get big problems if you apply a layer for SystemU!!!
- Support fonts from Substratum theme packages
- Lockscreen clock&date font style and size 
- Add animations to QS tiles
- Add interpolators to QS tile animations
- Extended audio panel
- Audio panel location
- Three-fingers-swipe to screenshot
- Fix property setting with failure
- Fix showing empty signal strength for TD-SCDMA
- Fix full nav gestures
- EAS 1.2 Power HAL 
- QCOM Boost Framework
- Updated QCOM performance configs From Tissot pie release

fixed:
- Traffic monitor tint on dark QS
- Use correct icon for ring volume
- Fix the legacy color icons
- Corrected padding of Syberia logo in statusbar
- Display Flickering bug
- Fix property setting with failure
- Fix showing empty signal strength for TD-SCDMA
- Fix full nav gestures
- Brought back msm_irqbalance from Daisy Pie

Kernel:
- Updated EAS to be closer to Mainline


Improvements:
- Clean Sim Dialog layout
- Modify connecitvity rematch logic to support MSIM devices
- Add HDMI hotplug handling
- Update translations
